cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("dissect")

	DISSECT("src", "%{ONE THING}").IGNORE_MISSING(true).APPEND_SEPARATOR("-")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: dissect
processors:
  - dissect:
      tag: dissect_src_f0dfce57
      field: src
      pattern: '%{ONE THING}'
      append_separator: '-'
      ignore_missing: true
